name: LED Water Dancing Speakers
description:
AWESOME - BEAUTIFUL - UNIQUE WATER DANCING SPEAKERS - EVERYONE LOVES THEM!

Product Description

Don't just hear your music, see your music! 

Introducing the original USB Dancing Water Speakers. You can connect the speakers easily to your PC, Smartphone including iPhone, or any other device with an 3.5mm audio output. 

There's no need for extra batteries, you just have to use the USB power cable to create a stunning visual display of both water and light. 

The generated water fountains dance in sync to every different beat and thanks to the five different vivid colors you will see your tunes come alive. 

You will love them and so will your friends and family!!!

Suitable for PC, Mac, MP3 Players, Mobile Phones, iPhone & Tablets.

Speaker output power 3W x 2 (6W Total) 

Size: 5.1cm x 6.3cm x 22.0cm 

They come in WHITE or BLACK 

Please let us know the color you prefer when purchasing.

UP Lift Your Spirit With this Water Fountain Speaker - Sound of love ❤ 

Superb 3 watt speaker delivers great Bass and sound quality performance.

Five multi-colored LED lights dazzle in the dark, creating many awesome visual effects.

Controls water dancing beats through the music player volume and tone flowing to the rhythm of your music.

Innovative design, simple and convenient to use, suitable for home and office.

name: Tokyoflash Inspired Infection LED Watch
description:
LEDs and a pulsating new display. Featuring a creatively designed full face mirrored lens and an innovative way to view time, no one is immune to Infection.

Housed in a smart new case, Infection is ergonomically designed to neatly fit the contours of your wrist, the tapered edges providing a smooth transition between the case and lens.

Twenty-seven multi-colored LEDs pulsate and move like cells across the curved face to present the time from beneath the attractive mirrored mineral crystal lens.

Finished with a matching leather band and stainless steel clasp, this is a flashy look that's sure to get you noticed.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Water Dancing Speaker
description:
It's a light and sound show!

This dancing water speaker is the most dramatic way to play your music. The wireless speaker feature powerful, built-in water fountains that 'dance' to the beat of the song.

Water Dancing While Sound Beats
The streams of water are lit by beautiful, brightly colored LEDs - a spectacular show to accompany your favorite music!

Wireless Music
This Dancing Water speaker connects to your phone or computer wirelessly via Bluetooth, with its built-in rechargeable battery, it provide hours of music without recharging.

Line-in Port for Use with Other Music Players
Use it with any music player with a 3.5 mm jack. Enjoy your favorite music, movies or games from a smart phone, MP3 player, Tablet or Laptop by using a connecting a 3.5 mm audio cable into the line-in port.

Built-in MP3 Player
Built in Micro SD card MP3 player, simple put your Micro SD card in, it will play music directly from it.

Control and Freedom
Music automatically stops when phone calls coming in, resume when call end; skip tracks, adjust volume with your phone or the buttons in front of the speaker; 

Specifications:
- Bluetooth Version: Bluetooth V3.0 + EDR
- Bluetooth profiles supported: HSP, HFP, A2DP and AVRCP
- Frequency Response: 20Hz - 20KHz
- Operating distance: 10 meters Class 2
- Battery capacity: 1000mAh
- Talk time: Up to 5 hours
- Music playing time: Up to 5 hours
- Standby time: Up to 250 hours
- Charging time: About 2.5 hour
- Accessories: USB charger cable, user guide

name: Holiday Special Bluetooth Bracelet
description: Be the first of your friends with this Bluetooth bracelet!  The holiday special is for the red and white colored bracelets only.

name: Liquid Activated Shot Glasses
description:
This really cool bar accessory blinks when it detects liquid in the glass and automatically shuts off when the liquid is gone.

Excellent for pubs, clubs, banquets and special events. Make your party a night to remember.  Also make great stocking stuffers.

Super-bright LEDs light up the bottom of this cup and flash through colors: red, jade, yellow, and blue.

Waterproof: Waterproof LED structure
Battery: Not replaceable
Material: GPPS

**This is the price per shot glass.  Cases of 12 are available.

name: LED Liquid Activated Shot Glass Set of 12
description:
Case of 12 LED Liquid activated shot glasses.

This really cool bar accessory blinks when it detects liquid in the glass and automatically shuts off when the liquid is gone.

Excellent for pubs, clubs, banquets and special events. Make your party a night to remember.  Also make great stocking stuffers.

Super-bright LEDs light up the bottom of this cup and flash through colors: red, jade, yellow, and blue.

Waterproof: Waterproof LED structure
Battery: Not replaceable
Material: GPPS

name: Set of two LED Liquid Activated Flutes
description:
Make champagne-worthy occasions even more special with these AWESOME light-up flutes!
Liquid activates the LED light show, cycling through a rainbow of colors.

Features
Clear acrylic; each holds 4 oz.
Hand wash.
Liquid activates the LED light show, cycling through a rainbow of colors.
Make champagne-worthy occasions even more special!
When the champagne is gone, the lights turn off--so keep the party going and the glasses filled!

name: LED Liquid Activated Champagne Flute Set of 4
description:

Liquid activates the LED light show, cycling through a rainbow of colors.

Features

Hand wash.
Liquid activates the LED light show, cycling through a rainbow of colors.
Make champagne-worthy occasions even more special!
When the champagne is gone, the lights turn off--so keep the party going and the glasses filled!

name: Bluetooth Bracelet
description:
Bluetooth bracelet with time display for handsfree talking and music playing.

Main features:
Display caller’s name and number
Vibration alert for disconnection warning after 5-10M
Vibration alert for incoming call
Answer/Conversation/Hang-up
Earphone support
MP3 play support
Synchronize telephone contacts, display caller name 
Time Display

Technical Specifications:
Compatible to Bluetooth 2.1 (standard)
Working Frequency: 2.4GHz
Workable distance 5-10M
Auto energy-saving mode
Low power consumption mode/ high speed operation mode
Safety certificate, data encryption

name: Aroma Heater
description:
•Soft light, Music and Scent are excellent for soothing your mood. 
•USB Aroma Heater with Radio + Speaker is a multi-function USB gadget. It functions as an aroma oil burner as well as a bedside light circulating seven different soft colors. You can also plug your iPod, MP3 player or PC to listen to music. Ideals for bedtime - when you need a peaceful and a relax environment.

•Features: 
-  Aroma heater makes perfumed atmosphere 
-  7 color changing mood light makes your relaxed fully 
-  Built-in FM radio (Frequency: 87.5MHz ~ 108MHz) 
-  3.5mm audio plug is able to connect with most MP3, MP4, Notebook and other personal electronic products as source component 
-  Powered by USB or 3 x AAA batteries (Batteries are NOT included) 
-  Dimension: 105 x 105 x 95mm (approx.) 
-  Weight: 173g 
-  Package Contents: 
-  USB Aroma Heater with Radio + Speaker 
-  USB Power Cable 
-  Audio Cable

name: LED Light Up Ice Bucket
description:
Light up ANY occasion with this LED color changing Ice Bucket.  Have a romantic night, take it to the club, be the talk of the next party you go to.

Can be used for champagne, wine or keeping chilled the beverage of your choice!  Choice of 7 interchangeable colors or just pick the color of your choice.  Remote control and rechargeable batteries for long lasting use.

Enhance your evening with this multi-color LED ice bucket. Chill wines, champagnes, beers, and even non alcoholic beverages. Whatever beverage you want cold, this baby will keep it cool, and do it in dazzling colored LED style! 

The stunning color effect will leave you dazzled. The bucket provides smooth transition from one color to the next providing you with an ambient atmosphere of which you have not seen the likes of, till now. 

This LED color changing ice bucket emits Red, Green, Blue and Purple. and Yellow with the transition effect, you'll see different shades of each color as the LED light changes from one color to another. In addition, while the LED ice bucket does its thing, you can simply press the select color button to stop the colors from changing. 

This LED Ice Bucket is designed in size to hold one standard size bottle of champagne or wine plus ice. 

If you own a restaurant and want to really make your bar area stand out? Well then is LED ice bucket is what you need. The multi-color LED ice bucket can be used in a single static (fixed) color or color changing Mode. 

Features:
•LED color changing ice 
•Dazzling array of colors 
•Sized to hold one large bottle of alcohol plus ice. 
•The Multi color LED ice bucket may encourage you to drink more, please drink in moderation 
•Primary Function: Multi-color LED light bucket 
•Bulb Life: 25000 Hours 
•Control Type: on board button 
•Primary Color Selection: Red, Blue, Purple, Violet, Green, Yellow, (plus other shades as it transitions from one to another) 
•On Board Control Functions:
- ON / OFF
- Select Color 
•Material Colors: Translucent PC Shell with Silver/Gray Color Base 
•Power: Power Adapter 100 - 240v 
•Battery Life: 3-5 hours 
•Operating Temperature: 0 C to 40 C 
•Dimensions: 150mm x 240mm (diameter x height)
